alert.note: Alert for Delaware (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 19 at 2:58PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Delaware County through 345 PM EDT... At 258 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Harvard, or 10 miles southwest of Walton, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Walton, Delhi, Colchester, Hamden, Hancock, Fishs Eddy, Harvard, Downsville, Corbett and East Branch. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 86/Route 17 between 87 and 92. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
